𒅴 ≈ 𒅗 •𒈨 KA.ME <> Kieme 𒅴 ≈ 𒀸𒋰𒁹𒈨̲𒁹̲ ᵠEME

𒅴𒂠 Pheme Sumer ⇔ 𒅴𒄀 EME.GI(na) Sumerian language / tongue / "mouth"

𒅴 ᴷEME 𓆎 𓏏 𓀀 𓁐 𓏥 Common copt Κοινή

𒅴 rEME 𓂋𓏤 Reime ⇔ name

𒅴 •lingu in 𒅴 𒋃 liz.rit lizard

𒅴𒃻 KA×ME+GAR ≈ 𒂊𒈨𒃻 e-me-ĝar emeĝarₓ "Magier" 𒅶 KA× ME+GI "magic" ≈ emeĝarₓ |KA×(ME.GAR)|

𒅗+𒈨 DUG+ME mouth 𒅴 tongue Zunge 𒈨mg/gm

𓆓𓂧 Dice 𒅗 DUG talk tongue ⇔ song = 𒊕 saĝ sagen

𒅴 lisan

eme-gud = lisanu elu, 'lofty speech'; ⇔ gut
eme-mus = lisan zimi, 'speech of adornment'; ⇔ muse⋍zimar zierde
eme-si-di = lisan mesari, 'correct speech'; ⇔ math
eme-gal = lisanu rabu, 'great speech' o Concerning
eme-TE-NAD we have notthe slightest basis for conjecture.

𒅴𒁄 /targuman/ translator תֻּרְגְּמָן turg'mán ت ر ج م ᵇt-r-ʒ-m
